title: Template:Birth year and age
source:
<includeonly>{{#if:{{{1|}}}|<!--
-->{{{1}}}年{{#if:{{{2|}}}
 |{{MONTHNAME|{{{2}}}}}}}（{{#if:{{{2|}}}
 |{{#ifexpr:{{CURRENTMONTH}}<{{{2}}}
  |{{#expr:{{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}-{{{1}}}-1}}
  |{{#ifexpr:{{CURRENTMONTH}}>{{{2}}}
   |{{#expr:{{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}-{{{1}}}}}
   |{{#expr:{{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}-{{{1}}}-1}}－{{#expr:{{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}-{{{1}}}}}
  }}
 }}
 |{{#expr:{{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}-{{{1}}}-1}}－{{#expr:{{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}}-{{{1}}}}}
}}歲）<!-- 錯誤檢查： -->{{#ifexpr: ( {{{1}}} > {{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}} ) OR ( {{{death-year|{{CURRENTYEAR}}}}} - {{{1}}} > 150 )
 |  {{error|無效年份}}
}}{{#if:{{{2|}}}|{{#ifexpr: ( {{{2}}} > 12 ) OR ( {{{2}}} < 1 )
 |  {{error|無效月份}}}}
}}<!--
-->|{{error|未指定年份}}}}</includeonly><noinclude>
{{documentation}}
</noinclude>
